description: Complete system overview documenting the core AI-assisted social services platform, its major components, and high-level architecture
Detailed documentation of the AI assistance system including the context-aware assistant, chat implementation, and integration with knowledge base
Comprehensive documentation of data models for treatment facilities, legal cases, resources, and their relationships including verification workflows
Technical documentation of the semantic search implementation, document categorization system, and vector embedding generation for legal/social services content
Detailed documentation of the legal case management system, including status workflows, milestone tracking, and document verification states
